column4: its working now. reinstalling the restricted modules did the trick
Good news for me too... testing my usb wireless card..an Asus... It's supported completely with WPE in Gutsy :P
awesome! Gutsy huh? can't wait to try it myself. Btw, do you by any chance have any ideas how to get my pcmcia tv tuner to work in feisty?
hmm I don't have any experience with those... srry
But I'm a tester for Gutsy.. It's coming up pretty good...
thanks. i bet that'll be another wild goose chase
r u testing new hardware on Gutsy?
euhm no I'm just hunting for bugs in usability and stuff... but I limit to trying out stuff that I have and use daily

It's in Gutsy alright... but they limit the options... it's ok though.. but I'd like to see a few more kick ass feature by default... however you can activate everything by installing the configurator ^^
It's really smooth even on the live-cd session with everything enabled what Gutsy offers as default.. am using intel video card.. and I loke what I see ^^
maybe I'll try to run the unstable in feisty. the screencasts' kick @$$
Ow but you can just give the live-cd a spin... or install it in VMware
good idea. That way I can check the other stuff Gutsy has (including bugs)
Some things don't work while the live-cd is running... like installing a printer... Those thing usualy work for now only when it's installed
well, seeing as how my printer isn't working well in itself, I'm sure that won't be a problem :)
